articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT WBW3 💖🚀
Re @developer_dao 🤝 @womenbuildweb3
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): 📣 To all women and non-binary members:
There’s now a DEVDAO-WOMEN section on Discord for women and non-binary frens to connect and discuss opportunities within the DAO & Web3 space. 🚀
Talks for Twitter Spaces and onboarding events have already started.
Drop by & say hi! 🤩
articles.title: RT WBW3 💖🚀: Re @developer_dao 🤝 @womenbuildweb3

articles.description:
RT Deric @ Web3 University 💖🛠️
Just had an awesome meeting with @developer_dao and @web3university about collaborating on building forums and code editors, free of charge, for new web3 developers.
No profit required.
This would never happen in Web2. #Web3 is a revolution.

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
for a team, project, company, protocol, or app to be considered web3, it must be decentralized.
because it is profitable & en vogue, people are slapping web3 on centralized solutions.
we must fight against this & call them out or we will repeat the same mistakes of the past.
